```{r,  include =FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo=TRUE)
BASE <- database()
selected_var_pos <- 1 
selected_var_name <- colnames(BASE)[selected_var_pos]

```


## Esto es TExto

Lalala
```{r, include =T}
plot(BASE)
```


```{r, include =T}
# Aislamos una variable en particular de la base de datos.
VR <- BASE[,1]
VR
```
<br>
<br>

```{r, include =T}
# Media
mean(VR)
```
<br>
<br>

```{r, include =T}
# Mediana 
median(VR)
```
<br>
<br>

```{r, include =T}
# Minimo
min(VR)
```
<br>
<br>

```{r, include =T}
# Maximo
max(VR)
```
<br>
<br>

```{r, include =T}
# Cantidad de Datos
length(VR)
```
<br>
<br>

```{r, include =T}
# Varianza
var(VR)
```
<br>
<br>

```{r, include =T}
# Desvio Estandard
sd(VR)
```
<br>
<br>

```{r, include =T}
# Summary
summary(VR)
```
<br>
<br>

```{r, include =T}
# Objeto MEDIDAS
MEDIDAS <- summary(VR)
MEDIDAS
```
<br>
<br>

```{r, include =T}
# Solo algunas MEDIDAS
MEDIDAS[c(2,3,5)]
```
